pageDescription: Expense Manager helps you track your finances intelligently. Manage expenses, budgets, and accounts with multi-currency support and advanced analytics.
heroSubtitle: Track your expenses, manage budgets, and analyze your financial habits with our comprehensive personal finance management app.
featuresSubtitle: Everything you need to manage your personal finances effectively
featureExpenseTrackingDesc: Record and categorize your daily expenses with detailed descriptions and custom categories.
featureBudgetManagementDesc: Set monthly budgets for different categories and get alerts when you're approaching limits.
featureMultiAccountDesc: Manage multiple bank accounts, credit cards, and cash accounts in one place.
featureMultiCurrencyDesc: Support for 50+ currencies with automatic conversion and real-time exchange rates.
featureAnalyticsDesc: Comprehensive reports and visualizations to understand your spending patterns.
featureBiometricDesc: Secure your financial data with fingerprint and Face ID authentication.
screenshotsSubtitle: See how Expense Manager looks and works
supportSubtitle: Get help and learn about our policies
faqDescription: Find answers to common questions about using Expense Manager.
termsDescription: Read our terms and conditions for using Expense Manager.
privacyDescription: Learn how we protect and handle your personal information.
contactDescription: Get in touch with our support team for assistance.
footerDescription: Your personal finance management solution for a better financial future.
footerCopyright: Â© 2024 Expense Manager. All rights reserved.
faqSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about using Expense Manager
contactSupport: If you can't find the answer you're looking for, our support team is here to help.
noResultsDescription: Try adjusting your search terms or browse different categories.
faq1Question: How do I add my first transaction?
faq1Answer: Tap the + button on the main screen, select 'Add Income' or 'Add Expense', choose a category, enter the amount and description, then tap Save.
faq2Answer: Yes! Create accounts in different currencies. The app will automatically convert amounts for analysis and reports.
faq3Question: How do I create my first account?
faq3Answer: Go to the Accounts tab, tap the + button, enter the account details and select your preferred currency, then save.
faq4Answer: Set spending limits for any category. Budgets are automatically set for monthly periods (30 days). The app tracks your spending and alerts you when you're near or exceed the limit.
faq5Question: Can I edit or delete transactions?
faq5Answer: Yes! Swipe left on any transaction to edit or delete it. You can also tap a transaction to open the edit screen.
faq6Question: How do I transfer money between accounts?
faq6Answer: From the main screen, tap the Transfer card (with the exchange icon), or go to any account details and tap the Transfer button. Select source and destination accounts, enter the amount and description, then save.
faq7Answer: Biometric authentication uses your fingerprint or Face ID to quickly and securely access the app. You can enable this in Settings > Security.
faq8Question: The app is running slowly, what should I do?
faq8Answer: Try closing and reopening the app, restart your device, or check if you have enough storage space. If the problem persists, contact support.
faq9Question: I can't see my data after updating the app
faq9Answer: Make sure you're logged in with the same account. If you're still having issues, try logging out and back in, or contact support for assistance.
faq10Question: Why am I not receiving notifications?
faq10Answer: Check your device's notification settings for the app, and ensure notifications are enabled in the app's settings under Notifications.
faq11Question: How do I change my password?
faq11Answer: Go to Settings > Profile > Change Password. Enter your current password and new password, then confirm the change.
faq12Answer: Yes, you can delete your account in Settings > Profile > Danger Zone > Delete Account. This action is permanent and cannot be undone.
faq13Question: How do I export my data?
faq13Answer: Go to Settings > Data Management > Export Data. You can export your transactions as a CSV file for backup or analysis.
faq14Answer: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption to protect your data both in transit and at rest. Your financial information is never shared with third parties without your explicit consent.
